name: Velour-Xtensions Self-Stick Lash Kit
about: What it is:A kit for lash application in just one step with pre-glued technology; these self-adhesive lash clusters are easy to apply and mess-free.u200b..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Handmade with lightweight and natural-looking fibers, these Self-Stick Lash Clusters are applied underneath your natural lashes for a seamless look. Use three clusters per eye for a full lash extension look, or one to two clusters to create a half lash. The mini Too Real Lash Extension Tool provides precise application for the most beginner-friendly, mess-free experience..This Set Contains:
ingredients: Acrylates Copolymer, Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently curl your natural lashes with the Velour Too Extra Lash Curler (sold separately)..-Carefully removing them from the tray, hold the cluster from the middle-outer end to avoid touching the band area. u200b.-Position the cluster underneath your natural lashes.u200b.-Squeeze the clusters and your natural lashes together with the Too Real Extension Tool. u200b.-Use three clusters per eye for a full lash extension look or one to two clusters to create a half lash..-Remove with clean fingers. Gently lift the clusters, holding them from the middle-outer end of the band.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These VELOUR BEAUTY lashes are so pretty and very easy to apply. I love that it already has glue on them, no mess and no glue getting in my eyes. I also like that the bands are so durable because Iu2019m not very gentle with tweezers lol! They are such good quality, feel very light, but look so full. It has the perfect length & volume! I will definitely be repurchasing these and others to try and recommend to others. These lashes are such a great values with an awesome price, trust me you will love them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Useless. Positive reviews are deceptive and incorrect. Hardly any adhesive, will not reliably stick. Don't fall for it, I feel like I just threw my money in the trash.
